*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Carr to John Sprowl, July 11, 1825. Introducing Doctor Le Hicks. Sprowl transmits letter to Austin, July 13.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nachitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-11-1825">11th July 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Doctor Le Hicks*/person_mentioned* came here recommended to me by the *person_mentioned*Parish Judge of the *location_mentioned*parish of Iberville*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* as a *person_mentioned*physician */person_mentioned*of talents who wished to establish himself in this *location_mentioned*parish*/location_mentioned*, or *location_mentioned*on your side of the Sabine*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Judge Dutton*/person_mentioned* says he has known him for two years past, one of which he practiced in his family " with more than common success, and that as a Citizen he gained the friendship and Esteem of all who knew him " He states also that he was aboard the Steam boat Tennessee when she sunk, and lost considerable property, and concludes by observing that he thinks him deserving of the esteem and assistance of all persons who consider merit and talents essential to the forming a *person_mentioned*physician*/person_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*This is all I Know of this Gentleman*/p*
*p*My Respects to your *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Carr */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Capt. J Sprowl*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D*location_mentioned*ist. of Aysh Bayou*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-13-1825">July 13th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*the within Letter of Recommendation was sent from *person_mentioned*Judge Carr */person_mentioned*to my self—but on the *person_mentioned*bareers */person_mentioned*manifesting a desire to go on to *location_mentioned*Cl° Austins Colony*/location_mentioned* I beg leve to recommend him to your faivour— thare is no doubt of *person_mentioned*Judge Carr*/person_mentioned*s being a man of Honour Honesty and Probity—I am with the highest sentiments of Esteem your Cincear friend—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Sprowl*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Cl° J. T. Gross,*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
